# roomForEntireHome()

**Instance Method**

A room that represents all parts of the home that don’t have a more specific room to represent them.

## Declaration

```swift
func roomForEntireHome() -> HMRoom
```

## Return Value

The room that represents all parts of the home that don’t have a more specific room to represent them.

## Discussion

HomeKit assigns new accessories to this room until you assign them to a more specific room with [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHome/assignAccessory(_:to:completionHandler:)], or until the user assigns them to a room using the Home app.

You can’t rename this room, add it to a zone, or remove it from the home. It also doesn’t appear in the home’s [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHome/rooms] array.

## Dividing a house into rooms

- **rooms**: An array of the rooms created and managed by the user.
- **addRoom(withName:completionHandler:)**: Creates a new room with the specified name.
- **removeRoom(_:completionHandler:)**: Removes a room from the home.
- **HMRoom**: The smallest subdivision of a home’s space.
